reviewText: One of the stupidest sasquatch movies ive ever seen, and ive seen a lot of them. Dont waste your money. It was a sub par attempt to make another slasher bigfoot movie. I was waiting for Jason to pop out with the mask - same story line but dumber.

Some friends and I go and 'look for bigfoot' (just an excuse to drink) ever year in Ohio near where this was filmed.. so we had a movie premiere and showed this.. it was GREAT.. just the right amount of cheesiness.. good times...
This is amazing! My expectations were really basement level but when Maryrose Littler made an appearance... OMG! She stole the movie! Make her a lead!!

Great film from independent producer.
Timely shipping and arrival via US mail.
What a neat flick. I wish it was available online in Amazon Prime videos.

This movie was filmed in my hometown and I have a few friends who were actors in this movie. It was interesting to watch and I enjoyed seeing places in the movie I drive by on a daily basis. The movie had a good plot and dialogue. Only drawback was due to the sound quality in parts of the movie. Other than that it was great! Plus, the director himself, Glenn Martin hand delivered the movie to my front door. That was awesome in itself!
Love It !!!!!! I do believe, I do believe : )
Best Movie Ever Made!! Must Watch...
